races.name: Qhoathian
races.description: A race of methane-breathing insects who are governed by a military dictatorship. Their soldiers ritually burn their own flesh as a demonstration of their bravery, leaving them horribly scarred. They have the largest army in the galaxy but they are hated by everyone.

races.name: Muonian
races.description: A race of aggressive creatures with large resonating chambers on the front of their heads, through which they speak and precognitive abilities. They are easily insulted and quick to judge.

races.name: Scientian
races.description: A race of peaceful scientists. They can live as long as a thousand years. They believe that the universe is a physical manifestation of God, and that gathering information about the universe is the only way to become closer to God.

races.name: Bromirian
races.description: Fur-covered bipeds with four large eyes and long drooping noses. Their civilization is dedicated to having fun and therefore they love travelling between galaxies.

races.name: Poseidian
races.description: A race of greedy humanoid aliens who have a set of inner eyelids and one enormous eye. They have natural gifts for business. They also love money and luxurious goods.

races.name: Neutral
races.description: The minor races in this galaxy.

planets.name: Photoria
planets.description: A layer of single-celled photosynthetic organisms covers the entire surface of the planet, giving it a uniform appearance and a vivid green colour. It is a nice planet to be on.

planets.name: Valhalla
planets.description: Game filler planet :(

planets.name: Lakota
planets.description: A small lifeless rock with an extremely thin nitrogen atmosphere. The planet is used as a weapons testing site, and its surface is pitted with craters.

planets.name: Zodia
planets.description: A military outpost for the Qhoathians.

planets.name: Sulis
planets.description: A desert world mostly covered with golden yellow sand, which is coloured by high levels of sulphur. "This is great for scientific research!", says the Scientian. It is also a great strategic point for invading the Qhoathians.

planets.name: Charlton
planets.description: Homeworld of the Qhoathians. The other fractions would love to come here just to ruin the land of the Qhoathians.

planets.name: Antaeus
planets.description: This planet acts as a major trading hub since it is located at the center of the galaxy. An Earth-like planet with an unusually large axial tilt causing extreme seasonal changes. Indigenous lifeforms include flying squid-like creatures and bovids. The Altaxian government has established a major trading post here.

planets.name: Ghanan
planets.description: The "Las Vegas" of the galaxy.

planets.name: Clovis
planets.description: Homeworld of Poseidian. It is really closed to the Qhoathians but according to rumors, the planet has a huge diamond core. Maybe that's why the Poseidians are here, at least it attracts a lot of people who want to make a fortune.

planets.name: Doral
planets.description: A small planet that has the most delicious food in the galaxy. The restaurants are run by the Poseidians, of course.

planets.name: Lukarna
planets.description: A planet very similar to Mars, only larger and with a slightly thicker atmosphere. The planet is used as an industrial base by the Scientians.

planets.name: Laskaris VI
planets.description: Homeworld of the Scientians. It is famous for its glass volcanoes and its dense forests of electroluminescent trees. Maybe it is not a great idea to travel to here.

planets.name: Arion
planets.description: A small planet almost entirely covered in snow and ice. Only at the height of summer do temperatures rise above freezing. The Muonians has established a major military outpost here.

planets.name: Kriza
planets.description: A warm Earth-like planet with vast grassland plains. It has no axial tilt, giving it a mild and predictable climate. Its pleasant climate and fascinating wildlife are helping turn it into a popular tourist destination.

planets.name: Narnia
planets.description: A small planet which is famous for its wardrobes and talking lions.

planets.name: Argo
planets.description: An Earth-like planet. One large continent stretches from the north pole to the south pole. Seasonal grasslands cover much of the landmass.

planets.name: Muon Prime
planets.description: Homeworld of the Muonians.

planets.name: Consileen
planets.description: A small planet with a surface consisting of 75% ice. It is the site of one of the largest battles between the Qhoathians and the Muonians in the galaxy's history. The planet is now home to an enormous memorial park and a major military base

planets.name: Vasquez
planets.description: Homeworld of the Bromirians. "It is a sh*t hole.", as described by the Bromirians themselves. They have been trying really hard to find a planet to migrate.

planets.name: Lokono
planets.description: Market place for the Muonians.

spaceShips.name: FTLS Dauphin
spaceShips.description: Space shuttle designed for short range transport. It is cheap and efficient.

spaceShips.name: FTL Adrastea
spaceShips.description: Space shuttle designed for medium range transport. It is basically a large version of the Dauphin.

spaceShips.name: FTL Starseeker
spaceShips.description: Long range transport shuttle from FTL.

spaceShips.name: UNS Banana
spaceShips.description: A copy cat of FTL's Dauphin spaceship but UNS claims that Banana revolutionized the design of spaceships.

spaceShips.name: UNS Guugle
spaceShips.description: A space ship that collect its passengers personal information but UNS says it is there to improve passenger experience.

spaceShips.name: UNS Thames
spaceShips.description: Long range transport shuttle from UNS.

spaceShips.name: UNS Hermes Starseeker
spaceShips.description: The best space shuttle ever made (TM).

spaceShips.name: SS Hermes0
spaceShips.description: 1st Generation Hyperluminal Spaceship. "We may have the most boring names but we have the best ships" - CEO of Star Ship
